name: Topside - GMTK 2022 Game Jam Submission
description:
You play as a six-sided die in this puzzle-shooter. Each face of the die corresponds to a different color, which will enable you to shoot enemies that match.

How to Play

Use WASD to roll the die from side-to-side and the arrow keys to rotate the camera. Enemies spawn from all four directions, so keep your wits about you!

You can shoot with Spacebar. Enemies of a different color will be immune to your bullets.

You lose when you fall off. See how many you can take with you!
